title: Ice cone to the conclusion that crit is just absolutely bogus
body:
Zed with 80 AD auto attacks and deals 80 damage 
 
Zed with 80 AD and crit auto attacks and deals 160 damage

Zed with 80 AD with infinity edge and crit deals 200 damage 

The problem isn't infinity edge it's crit in general. You don't even need alot of AD for crits to be effective 

(I used zed as an example because adc mains are jerks and would defend crit like their life depended on it)

replies.body: Dang its almost like you realized  crit is double damage and ie furthers that damage. hmm
I've come to the conclusion that you're drunk.
